sentence.text: In trans-ethnic meta-analyses of U4C and UK Biobank data, we found significant associations between breast cancer risk and the expression of chromatin organization (joint p-value: 3.6x10-06) and pyrimidine nucleoside biosynthetic process (p-value: 7.1x10-06) in breast tissue, as well as a suggestive association for ANKLE1 (p-value: 9.3x10-05).
While genome-wide association studies (GWAS) have implicated chromatin organization and protein export from nucleus in breast cancer risk, they have not identified the remaining three genes.
